column1: Uchi////I've long been a fan of their Walu Walu ($17)
column2: a oak grilled escolar with candied citrus and yuzu (umami) flavoring throughout. The Hamachi Nabe ($18) is a savory dish consisting of yellowtail
column3: koshihihikari rice over soy broth and eggyolk. Finally
column4: the Hot Rock ($19) is a wonderful bit of wagyu beef on its own in ponzu sauce
column5: but it's even better with a diver scallop and sanbaizu. From the cold side
column6: I am a sucker for the Machi Cure ($18)
column8: marcona almond with a yucca crisp.
